Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometries.Geometry
      • geometries.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Polygon
extends Geometry
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system

    Dan
